removeCompany(long) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminService
Removing Company Object From DB(Including Company Coupons).
removeCompany(long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminServiceImpl
Remove Company A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
and uses the CouponRepository.class to remove the company coupons in the data base.
RemoveCompany(long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.AdminWebService
Remove Comapny A method that receives a company Id from client in as a request parameter - and removes the request Company In the DB using the AdminServiceImplantion.class

removeCoupon(long, long) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyService
Removing Coupon In the DB.
removeCoupon(long, long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyServiceImpl
Remove Coupon A method that receives a couponId and companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupon from the lists of purchased coupons by the customers in the data base.
RemoveCoupon(HttpSession, long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.CompanyWebService
Remove Coupon A method that receives a coupon Id from client as a request parameter and the client details by the current Session - and remove the Coupon In the DB using the CompanyServiceImplantion.class
removeCustomer(long) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminService
Removing Customer Object From DB(Including Customer Coupons).
removeCustomer(long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminServiceImpl
Remove Customer A method that receives a customer Id validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupons from the list of purchased coupons by the customer in the data base.
RemoveCustomer(long) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.AdminWebService
Remove Customer A method that receives a customer Id from client in as a request parameter - and removes the request Customer In the DB using the AdminServiceImplantion.class
